Stoppable.h

00001 #ifndef STOPPABLE_H
00002 #define STOPPABLE_H
00003 
00004 #include <iostream>
00005 #include <assert.h>
00006 #include <boost/chrono.hpp>
00007 #include <boost/thread.hpp>
00008 #include <boost/thread/future.hpp>
00009 #include <boost/move/move.hpp>
00010 
00011 /*
00012  * Class that encapsulates promise and future object and
00013  * provides API to set exit signal for the thread
00014  */
00015 namespace VTD {
00016 
00017 class Stoppable
00018 {
00019         BOOST_MOVABLE_BUT_NOT_COPYABLE(Stoppable);
00020         boost::promise<void> exitSignal_;
00021         boost::unique_future<void> futureObj_;
00022 public:
00023 
00024     Stoppable() : futureObj_(exitSignal_.get_future())
00025     {
00026     }
00027 
00028     Stoppable(BOOST_RV_REF(Stoppable) obj) : exitSignal_(boost::move(obj.exitSignal_)), futureObj_(boost::move(obj.futureObj_))
00029     {
00030         // std::cout << "Move Constructor is called" << std::endl;
00031     }
00032  
00033     Stoppable & operator=(BOOST_RV_REF(Stoppable) obj)
00034     {
00035         // std::cout << "Move Assignment is called" << std::endl;
00036                 exitSignal_ = boost::move(obj.exitSignal_);
00037                 futureObj_ = boost::move(obj.futureObj_);
00038         return *this;
00039     }
00040  
00041     // Task need to provide defination  for this function
00042     // It will be called by thread function
00043     virtual void run() = 0;
00044 
00045 
00046     // Thread function to be executed by thread
00047     void operator()()
00048     {
00049         run();
00050     }
00051  
00052     //Checks if thread is requested to stop
00053     bool stopRequested()
00054     {
00055         // checks if value in future object is available
00056                 if (futureObj_.wait_for(boost::chrono::milliseconds(0)) == boost::future_status::timeout)
00057             return false;
00058         return true;
00059     }
00060     // Request the thread to stop by setting value in promise object
00061     void stop()
00062     {
00063                 exitSignal_.set_value();
00064     }
00065 };
00066 
00067 }
00068 
00069 #endif // STOPPABLE_H
